amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 166-61 to clarify the ability of Navigators to provide referrals to community-based organizations that address social needs related to health outcomes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gomez amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Gomez.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gomez amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
